name: WYKOP.PL - stary dobry design (szerokość: 1024)
description:
- usunięte reklamy i box`y, 
- maksimum treści, minimum wodotrysków,
- styl maksymalnie zbliżony do starego designu,
- przywrócona kolorystyka i czcionki starego designu,
- wiele innych

------------

Strona główna: 
http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/6144/strglowna.png

Strona komentarzy: 
http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/5093/strcomments.png
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document domain("wykop.pl") {#sub-list,#sidebar,.separate,.add-full,.disclaimer {display: none !important}.c-block {width: 950px !important;}.entry {width: 940px !important;}.comment {margin-top: -10px !important;}.comment p {margin-top: 5px !important;}.comment blockquote {width: 890px !important;}.subcomment cite {padding-top: 12px !important;}.subcomment blockquote {width: 850px !important;}.comments span {color: #3B708A !important;}.comments a {color: #3B708A !important;}.show-comment {margin-top: 10px !important; right: 20px !important;}.hide-comment {margin-top: 10px !important; right: 20px !important;}.add-comment {width: 970px !important;}.comment-area {width: 875px !important;}#add-comment-area {width: 870px !important; font-size: 14px !important; font-family: verdana !important; color: black !important;}#add-comment-entry {width: 950px !important;}#comments-list-entry {margin-left: 0px !important;}.layer-rounded {margin-top: 30px !important;}.illustration {margin-top: -70px !important;}.illustration {background-image: none !important;}#view-frame {margin-top: -40px !important;}p {font-size: 13px !important;}.linkdata {font-size: 20px  !important;}p {font-family: verdana !important;}.entry-text {width: 950px !important;}.entry-text p {width: 650px !important;}.entry-details {width: 950px !important;}blockquote {width: 940px !important;}.toggle-comment {margin-right: 60px !important;}#footer-container {display: none!important;}#body-container .wrapper #content-entry blockquote.entry-details .entry-text {width:850px!important;}#body-container .wrapper #content, #body-container .wrapper #content-before {margin-top: 0px !important;margin-left: 5px !important; width:930px !important; background:none repeat scroll 0 0 white !important;}#body-container .wrapper ul.comments-list > li.ownercomment blockquote .inner .inner-2nd {background:none repeat scroll 0 0 #F0FBEB !important;}#body-container .wrapper ul.comments-list.entry > li blockquote .inner .inner-2nd .head-left .head-right {background: none !important;border-bottom: 1px solid #90a4b8 !important; border-top: 1px solid #90a4b8 !important;}#body-container .wrapper ul.comments-list.entry > li.subcomment blockquote .inner .inner-2nd .head-left .head-right h5.head {padding-top: 2px !important;	padding-bottom: 2px !important;}#body-container .wrapper #content ol.entry > li blockquote h4 > a, #body-container .wrapper #content-entry blockquote.entry-details h4 > a,#body-container .wrapper ul.comments-list.user-active > li blockquote .inner .inner-2nd p.external > a big {color:#FF5917 !important; font-family: "Trebuchet MS", Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif !important;}#comments-list-profile blockquote {width: 850px !important;}.inner .inner-2nd, .wizard blockquote .inner .inner-2nd {background:none repeat scroll 0 0 white !important;}span strong {color: #336699 !important;}.groups strong {color: #3399CC !important;}.head strong {font-size: 12px !important;}body {background: none !important; font-family: Tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif !important;}#main-list {width: 991px !important; margin-left: -22px !important; padding-left: 20px !important;}#main-list {background: none !important;}#main-list {background-image: url('http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/3418/64826654.png') !important;}#main-list em {font-size: 11px !important; font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif !important;}#header-container .wrapper ul#main-menu li#main-list>ul>li a.selected span em {background: none !important;}#header-container .wrapper ul#main-menu li#main-list>ul>li a.selected span em {background-image: url('http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/3669/71245358.png') !important; font-size: 12px !important; font-family: Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif !important; color: #69ADD1 !important; font-weight: bold !important;}blockquote span a {color: #3B708A !important; font-weight: normal !important;}blockquote {margin-bottom: 4px !important; margin-top: 10px !important;}.tabs {width: 940px !important;}.tabs span {font-size: 11px !important;}.tabs em {background: none !important;}.tabs span {background: none !important;}.tabs a {background: none !important;}.tabs strong {font-size: 11px !important;}.selected {font-weight: bold !important;}.selected strong {font-weight: bold !important; color: black !important;}.selected em {border-top: 1px white !important;}.recommends {float: left !important;}.sorting {position:absolute !important; margin-top: -25px !important; margin-left: 665px !important;
